Walkthrough Jupyter Notebooks

1- Create a new notebook

2- Write the following in the first cell:

print("Hello World")

3- Press Shift + Enter. What happens?

4- Write the following in the second cell:

print("Hello World)

5- Press Shift + Enter. What happens?

6- Write the following in the third cell:

#print("Hello World)

7- Press Shift + Enter. What happens?

8- Now find how to restart the kernel and clear all ouput from all cells.

9- Now run all cells again at once

10- Delete the notebook where you wrote that code
